snippet.title: Camille and Laura Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Camille and Laura on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3129110/Camille_and_Laura/

Camille and Laura is a hand-drawn, narrative point and click about the daily life of a single mother from Montreal. It takes inspiration from the aesthetics of children shows like Peppa Pig and PJ Masks to tell a simple, human story about regular struggles. The game is solo-developed and received a financial help from the Canada Council for the Arts.
